Package com.PDFtoXMLConverter

Interface BusinessTableInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InvoiceItemsTable, NonStandardTable
    public interface BusinessTableInterface
    Interface for document specific requirements such as checking end of table, merging rows - methods that will change with doc type
    Author:
    BHAVYA SHARMA

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isEOT​(int lineNo, PDFLine line)
      Checks whether given line is the line where table ends
      void mergeRows​(int i)
      Checks if given row needs to be merged with previous.
      void mergeRows​(int rowNum, PDFLine line1, PDFLine line2)
      Checks if given row needs to be merged with previous.

    • Method Detail

      • isEOT

        boolean isEOT​(int lineNo,
              PDFLine line)
        Checks whether given line is the line where table ends
        Parameters:
        lineNo - line number of line to be checked
        line - line to be checked

      • mergeRows

        void mergeRows​(int i)
        Checks if given row needs to be merged with previous. If yes, merges row with previous
        Parameters:
        i - line number of row to be checked

      • mergeRows

        void mergeRows​(int rowNum,
               PDFLine line1,
               PDFLine line2)
        Checks if given row needs to be merged with previous. If yes, merges row with previous
        Parameters:
        line1 - line number of current row
        line2 - line number of previous row
